content: whale sweater is a good start for those knitters who feel confident in making knit and purl stitches and are ready to start with a big project you can go from cast-on to bind-off with ease thanks to the sweater s bottom-up construction round yoke and accompanying video instructions whether you knit the sweater for yourself or a loved one its comfortable roomy fit makes it easy to suit everyone since the pattern is available for free this is a great chance for you to explore the world of round-yoke sweaters size xs / s / m / l / xl / xxl women and men actual width 85 / 93 / 101 / 109 / 117 / 123 cm - 34 6 / 38 2 / 41 7 / 45 3 / 48 8 / 52 4
